TextView.android:text: symptoms • Fatigue. • Easily bleeding or bruising. • Loss of appetite. • Nausea. • Swelling in your legs, feet or ankles (edema) • Weight loss. • Itchy skin. • Yellow discoloration in the skin and eyes (jaundice) food to avoid • Alcohol • Added sugar • Fried foods • Salt. • White bread • rice • pasta. • Red meat. food to take • fruit • vegitable • fish • high fibre food • rice • milk • salad • coconat water • brinjal vegetable • aloo vegetable
